overview:
Mr. Stone has served as a Managing Director of Northgate since 2001. Prior to Northgate, Mr. Stone was an Associate at Bain Capital. While at Bain, Mr. Stone was involved in due diligence for over 30 private equity investment opportunities. Prior to joining Bain Capital, Mr. Stone was a management consultant with McKinsey & Company.

Mr. Stone holds an M.B.A. from Harvard Business School, where he graduated with high distinction as a Baker Scholar; a J.D. from Yale Law School; and a B.A. in Honors Economics from Brigham Young University, where he graduated valedictorian. While at Yale Law School, he co-founded the Amistad Academy, a New Haven-based charter school focused on academic excellence and civics.
